message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can we meet in the middle at $8500?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $9000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $8200 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I'm still not quite there. I can do $9200, but that's as low as I can go. I really think you'll love this product, and I'm willing to meet you at this price.
